question: Which is the second Indian company to reach the market capitalisation of Rs 12 lakh crore?
explanation:
The market capitalisation of Tata Consultancy Services has recently touched Rs 12 lakh crore, after the company poster its strongest growth in third-quarter.
The profits of the company increased by 7.1 per cent on a year-on-year basis. Reliance Industries (RIL) became the first Indian company to achieve this feat of Rs 12 lakh crore m-cap, in July 2020.
